definitions: To spread something out, especially in an organized way.
To arrange something according to a plan.
To prepare a dead body for burial.
To design or plan the arrangement of something.
To spend money, especially a large amount.
examples: She will lay out the picnic blanket.
They laid out the plans for the new building.
The funeral director will lay out the deceased.
He needs to lay out the garden.
They had to lay out a lot of money for the repairs.
